mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile_service.student_profiles ( profile_id, full_name, major, date_of_birth, address, university, academic_year_start, academic_year_end, phone_number, is_approved, status, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{profileId}, #{fullName}, #{major}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{address}, #{university}, #{academicYearStart}, #{academicYearEnd}, #{phoneNumber}, 0, 1, 0, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE student_profiles SET full_name = #{fullName}, major = #{major}, date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth}, address = #{address}, university = #{university}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl}, academic_year_start = #{academicYearStart}, academic_year_end = #{academicYearEnd}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE profile_id = #{profileId}
UPDATE student_profiles SET avatar_url = #{avatar}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE profile_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT full_name FROM profile_service.student_profiles WHERE profile_id = #{profileId} AND is_deleted = false
